```{r}
SpotifyDataset <- SpotifyDataset

ls(SpotifyDataset)
library(dplyr)
```


```{r}
SpotifyDataset <-
SpotifyDataset %>%
  dplyr::select (-Track.URI, -Artist.URI.s. , -Album.URI, -Album.Artist.URI.s. , -Album.Image.URL , -Track.Preview.URL , -ISRC, -Added.By, -Added.At, -Album.Genres, -Copyrights)

```



```{r}
ggplot(df, aes(x = 1, y = percent, fill = )) +
  geom_col() +
  coord_polar(theta = "y") +
  geom_text(aes(label = paste(percent, "%")),
            position = position_stack(vjust = 0.5),
            size = 8) +
  theme_void(base_size = 20) +
  scale_fill_brewer(name = NULL, palette = "Pastel2")
```
